verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> it <S%G1096>came<s%> about that <S%G1722>while<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> were <S%G1945>pressing<s%> <S%G1945>around<s%> Him and <S%G191>listening<s%> to the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> He was <S%G2476>standing<s%> by the <S%G3041>lake<s%> of <S%G1082>Gennesaret;<s%>

and He <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G4142>boats<s%> <S%G2476>lying<s%> at the edge of the <S%G3041>lake;<s%> but the <S%G231>fishermen<s%> had <S%G576>gotten<s%> out of them, and were <S%G4150>washing<s%> their <S%G1350>nets.<s%>

And He <S%G1684>got<s%> into <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G4143>boats,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> was Simon's, and <S%G2065>asked<s%> him to <S%G1877>put<s%> out a <S%G3641>little<s%> <S%G3641>way<s%> from the <S%G1093>land.<s%> And He <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G2523>down<s%> and [began] <S%G1321>teaching<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> from the <S%G4143>boat.<s%>

And <S%G5613>when<s%> He had <S%G3973>finished<s%> <S%G2980>speaking,<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G4613>Simon,<s%> <S%G1877>"Put<s%> out into the <S%G899>deep<s%> <S%G899>water<s%> and <S%G5465>let<s%> <S%G5465>down<s%> your <S%G1350>nets<s%> for a <S%G61>catch.<s%>"

And <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G1988>"Master,<s%> we <S%G2872>worked<s%> <S%G2872>hard<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> and <S%G2983>caught<s%> <S%G3762>nothing,<s%> but at Your <S%G4487>bidding<s%> I will <S%G5465>let<s%> <S%G5465>down<s%> the <S%G1350>nets.<s%>"

And when they had <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> they <S%G4788>enclosed<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4128>quantity<s%> of <S%G2486>fish;<s%> and their <S%G1350>nets<s%> [began] to <S%G1284>break;<s%>

and they <S%G2656>signaled<s%> to their <S%G3353>partners<s%> in the <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G4143>boat,<s%> for them to <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G4815>help<s%> them. And they <S%G2064>came,<s%> and <S%G4092>filled<s%> <S%G297>both<s%> of the <S%G4143>boats,<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that they began to <S%G1036>sink.<s%>

But when <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> [that,] he <S%G4363>fell<s%> <S%G4363>down<s%> at Jesus' <S%G1119>feet,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1831>"Depart<s%> from me, for I <S%G1510>am<s%> a <S%G268>sinful<s%> <S%G435>man,<s%> O <S%G2962>Lord!<s%>"

For <S%G2285>amazement<s%> had <S%G4023>seized<s%> him and <S%G3956>all<s%> his <S%G3588>companions<s%> <S%G4862><s%> <S%G1909>because<s%> of the <S%G61>catch<s%> of <S%G2486>fish<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they had <S%G4815>taken;<s%>

and <S%G3668>so<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> and <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G2199>Zebedee,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> were <S%G2844>partners<s%> with <S%G4613>Simon.<s%> And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G4613>Simon,<s%> "Do not <S%G5399>fear,<s%> from <S%G3568>now<s%> on you will be <S%G2221>catching<s%> <S%G444>men.<s%>"
And when they had <S%G2609>brought<s%> their <S%G4143>boats<s%> to <S%G1093>land,<s%> they <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G3956>everything<s%> and <S%G190>followed<s%> Him.

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> about that <S%G1722>while<s%> He was in <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G4172>cities,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> [there was] a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G4134>full<s%> of <S%G3014>leprosy;<s%> and when he <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> he <S%G4098>fell<s%> on his <S%G4383>face<s%> and <S%G1189>implored<s%> Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> You are <S%G2309>willing,<s%> You <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G2511>make<s%> me <S%G2511>clean.<s%>"

And He <S%G1614>stretched<s%> out His <S%G5495>hand,<s%> and <S%G681>touched<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "I <S%G2309>am<s%> <S%G2309>willing;<s%> be <S%G2511>cleansed.<s%>" And <S%G2112>immediately<s%> the <S%G3014>leprosy<s%> <S%G565>left<s%> him.

And He <S%G3853>ordered<s%> him to <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>one,<s%> "But <S%G565>go<s%> and <S%G1166>show<s%> <S%G4572>yourself<s%> to the <S%G2409>priest,<s%> and <S%G4374>make<s%> an <S%G4374>offering<s%> for your <S%G2512>cleansing,<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G4367>commanded,<s%> for a <S%G3142>testimony<s%> to them."

But the <S%G3056>news<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> Him was <S%G1330>spreading<s%> <S%G3123>even<s%> <S%G3123>farther,<s%> and <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> were <S%G4905>gathering<s%> to <S%G191>hear<s%> [Him] and to be <S%G2323>healed<s%> of their <S%G769>sicknesses.<s%>
But He <S%G846>Himself<s%> would [often] <S%G5298>slip<s%> <S%G5298>away<s%> to the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%> and <S%G4336>pray.<s%>

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> about <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> that He was <S%G1321>teaching;<s%> and there were [some] <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> and <S%G3547>teachers<s%> of the <S%G3547>law<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%> [there,] <S%G3739>who<s%> had <S%G2064>come<s%> from <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G2968>village<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee<s%> and <S%G2453>Judea<s%> and [from] <S%G2419>Jerusalem;<s%> and the <S%G1411>power<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> was [present] for Him to <S%G2390>perform<s%> <S%G2390>healing.<s%>

And <S%G2400>behold,<s%> [some] <S%G435>men<s%> [were] <S%G5342>carrying<s%> on a <S%G2825>bed<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> was <S%G3886>paralyzed;<s%> and they were <S%G2212>trying<s%> to <S%G1533>bring<s%> him in, and to <S%G5087>set<s%> him <S%G5087>down<s%> in <S%G1799>front<s%> of Him.

And not <S%G2147>finding<s%> <S%G4169>any<s%> [way] to <S%G1533>bring<s%> him in <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G3793>crowd,<s%> they <S%G305>went<s%> up on the <S%G1430>roof<s%> and <S%G2524>let<s%> him <S%G2524>down<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G2766>tiles<s%> with his <S%G2826>stretcher,<s%> right in the <S%G3319>center,<s%> in <S%G1715>front<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
And <S%G3708>seeing<s%> their <S%G4102>faith,<s%> He <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G444>"Friend,<s%> your <S%G266>sins<s%> are <S%G863>forgiven<s%> you."

And the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G1260>reason,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>"Who<s%> is <S%G3778>this<s%> [man] <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2980>speaks<s%> <S%G988>blasphemies<s%>? <S%G5101>Who<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G863>forgive<s%> <S%G266>sins,<s%> but <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3441>alone<s%>?"

But <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G1921>aware<s%> of their <S%G1261>reasonings,<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>"Why<s%> are you <S%G1260>reasoning<s%> in your <S%G2588>hearts<s%>?

<S%G5101>"Which<s%> is <S%G2123>easier,<s%> to <S%G3004>say,<s%> 'Your <S%G266>sins<s%> have been <S%G863>forgiven<s%> you,' <S%G2228>or<s%> to <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G1453>'Rise<s%> and <S%G4043>walk<s%>'?

"But in <S%G2443>order<s%> that you may <S%G3609>know<s%> that the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> on <S%G1093>earth<s%> to <S%G863>forgive<s%> <S%G266>sins,<s%>" – He <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G3886>paralytic<s%> – "I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G1453>rise,<s%> and <S%G142>take<s%> up your <S%G2826>stretcher<s%> and <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G3624>home.<s%>"

And at <S%G3916>once<s%> he <S%G450>rose<s%> up <S%G1799>before<s%> them, and <S%G142>took<s%> up <S%G3739>what<s%> he had been <S%G2621>lying<s%> on, and <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G3624>home,<s%> <S%G1392>glorifying<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And they were <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G2983>seized<s%> with <S%G1611>astonishment<s%> and [began] <S%G1392>glorifying<s%> <S%G2316>God;<s%> and they were <S%G4092>filled<s%> with <S%G5401>fear,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "We have <S%G3708>seen<s%> <S%G3861>remarkable<s%> <S%G3861>things<s%> <S%G4594>today.<s%>"

And <S%G3326>after<s%> that He <S%G1831>went<s%> out, and <S%G2300>noticed<s%> a <S%G5058>tax-gatherer<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G3017>Levi,<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%> in the tax <S%G5058>office,<s%> and He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G190>"Follow<s%> Me."
And he <S%G2641>left<s%> <S%G3956>everything<s%> <S%G2641>behind,<s%> and <S%G450>rose<s%> and [began] to <S%G190>follow<s%> Him.

And <S%G3017>Levi<s%> <S%G4160>gave<s%> a <S%G3173>big<s%> <S%G1403>reception<s%> for Him in his <S%G3614>house;<s%> and there was a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>crowd<s%> of tax-gatherers and <S%G243>other<s%> [people] <S%G3739>who<s%> were <S%G2621>reclining<s%> [at the table] with them.

And the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> and their <S%G1122>scribes<s%> [began] <S%G1111>grumbling<s%> at His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1223>"Why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> do you <S%G2068>eat<s%> and <S%G4095>drink<s%> with the tax-gatherers and <S%G268>sinners<s%>?"

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "[It is] not <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G5198>well<s%> who <S%G5532>need<s%> a <S%G2395>physician,<s%> but <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G2560>sick.<s%>
"I have not <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G2564>call<s%> the <S%G1342>righteous<s%> but <S%G268>sinners<s%> to <S%G3341>repentance.<s%>"

And they <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, "The <S%G3101>disciples<s%> of <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G4437>often<s%> <S%G3522>fast<s%> and <S%G4160>offer<s%> <S%G1162>prayers;<s%> the [disciples] of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> do the <S%G3668>same;<s%> but <S%G4674>Yours<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> and <S%G4095>drink.<s%>"

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "You <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G4160>make<s%> the <S%G5207>attendants<s%> of the <S%G3567>bridegroom<s%> <S%G3522>fast<s%> <S%G1722>while<s%> <S%G3739><s%> the <S%G3566>bridegroom<s%> is with them, can you?

"But [the] <S%G2250>days<s%> will <S%G2064>come;<s%> and <S%G3752>when<s%> the <S%G3566>bridegroom<s%> is <S%G522>taken<s%> <S%G522>away<s%> from them, <S%G5119>then<s%> they will <S%G3522>fast<s%> in <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days.<s%>"

And He was <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3004>telling<s%> them a <S%G3850>parable:<s%> <S%G3762>"No<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G4977>tears<s%> a <S%G1915>piece<s%> from a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G2440>garment<s%> and <S%G1911>puts<s%> it on an <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G2440>garment;<s%> <S%G7507>otherwise<s%> he will <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G4977>tear<s%> the <S%G2537>new,<s%> and the <S%G1915>piece<s%> from the <S%G2537>new<s%> will not <S%G4856>match<s%> the <S%G3820>old.<s%>

"And <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G906>puts<s%> <S%G3501>new<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%> into <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G779>wineskins;<s%> <S%G7507>otherwise<s%> the <S%G3501>new<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%> will <S%G4486>burst<s%> the <S%G779>skins,<s%> and it will be <S%G7062>spilled<s%> out, and the <S%G779>skins<s%> will be <S%G622>ruined.<s%>
"But <S%G3501>new<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%> <S%G992>must<s%> be <S%G992>put<s%> into <S%G2537>fresh<s%> <S%G779>wineskins.<s%>

"And <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one,<s%> after <S%G4095>drinking<s%> <S%G3820>old<s%> [wine] <S%G2309>wishes<s%> for <S%G3501>new;<s%> for he <S%G3004>says,<s%> 'The <S%G3820>old<s%> is <S%G5543>good<s%> [enough.]'"
